short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds extra functions to Speedrun.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Extension for the speedrun.com website, that adds extra features such as:
- Filter a leaderboarad page by country,
- View the game verification queue on the website
- Podiums Count on Player profile
- Remove Custom styles from pages option
- Remove Sidebar option
You can use these with the extension popup, or the buttons that the extension adds to the website!
